meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of phenocrysts.
meanings.sent1: The phenocrystic minerals were easily visible in the rock.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the phenocrystic crystals in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The phenocrystic gems sparkled like tiny stars in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone with a phenocrystic brilliance that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The phenocrystic formations resembled a miniature galaxy under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The phenocrystic rock displayed large crystals embedded within.
meanings.sent2: The volcanic rock was phenocrystic, with distinct mineral inclusions.
meanings.sent3: The phenocrystic stone seemed to hold secrets within its core.
meanings.sent4: The phenocrystic structure of the rock revealed its ancient origins.
meanings.sent5: The phenocrystic composition of the rock hinted at its volcanic history.

meanings.sent1: The phenocrystic magma contained various crystal types.
meanings.sent2: The phenocrystic texture of the rock indicated its formation process.
meanings.sent3: The phenocrystic material resembled a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The phenocrystic content of the rock added to its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The phenocrystic composition of the mineral sample fascinated the researchers.
